attributes.action: Make it legal to own marijuana
attributes.additional_details:
The use of marijuana should be legal in U.K because thousands of people use this substance for recreational purposes and medical purposes each year responsibly for its physical and/or mental benefits. 
The argument that Taking marijuana will lead to the consumption of other illegal substances is completely not true, the only reason this may happen is that when people are  byeing marijuana and are being unnecessarily exposed to other substances by drug dealers.
attributes.background: Marijuana should be made legal because it could help save lives. This substance is a healthier alternative to alcohol. Their has never been a recorded case of some one dying from marijuana while in 2014 more that 8,000 people died of alcohol related deaths.
